input_file.title: Input file
input_file.description: Input PNM file (binary PGM 'P5', PPM 'P6' or PAM 'P8')

gamma.title: Gamma
gamma.description: Transfer-function exponent (``gamma'') of the image in floating-point format (e.g., ``0.45455''). If image looks correct on given display system, image gamma is equal to inverse of display-system exponent, i.e., 1 / (LUT * CRT) (where LUT = lookup-table exponent and CRT = CRT exponent; first varies, second is usually 2.2, all are positive)

bgcolor.title: Background color
bgcolor.description: Desired background color for alpha-channel images, in 7-character hex RGB format (e.g., ``#ff7700'' for orange: same as HTML colors)

text_flag.title: Text flag
text_flag.description: Prompt interactively for text info (tEXt chunks)

time_flag.title: Time flag
time_flag.description: Include a tIME chunk (last modification time)
